import React from 'react'; import person from '../images/person.svg'; import lock from '../images/lock.svg'; class Register extends React.Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state={ username : "", password : "", password2 : "", name:"", ph_no:"", error:{ username : "", password : "", cpassword : "", name:"", phone:"" } } } handleSubmit = (e) =>{ let username = false, name=false, password=false,phone=false; if (!(this.state.username.length>2 && this.state.username.length<31)){ username = "Length of Username should be between 3 and 30"; } if (!(this.state.name.length>2 && this.state.name.length<41)){ username = "Length of Name should be between 3 and 40"; } if (!(this.state.username.password>2 && this.state.username.password<31)){ username = "Length of Username should be between 3 and 30"; } if (!(this.state.username.length>2 && this.state.username.length<31)){ username = "Length of Username should be between 3 and 30"; } if (!(this.state.username.length>2 && this.state.username.length<31)){ username = "Length of Username should be between 3 and 30"; } } render(){ return(

REGISTER

{this.state.error.name}
{this.state.error.username}
{this.state.error.phone}
{this.state.error.password}
{this.state.error.password}

Already have an account? Sign In

); } } export default Register;
